verses.roman:
mahāprabhura gaṇa yata āila gauḍa haite
bhaṭṭācārya, eke eke dekhāha āmāte

synonyms: mahāprabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; gaṇa—associates; yata—all; āila—who have come; gauḍa haite—from Bengal; bhaṭṭācārya—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; eke eke—one after another; dekhāha—please show; āmāte—to me.
translation: "Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya, please show me, one after another, all of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's devotees who are coming from Bengal."
